main.name: Cheria Artis
main.description: Full Stack Developer by Day, Photographer by night
main.bio: My name is Cheria, I'm a Full Stack ReactJS Developer. Currently I am attending Kenzie Academy and working as a life coach.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details, get coached or to interview me.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

work.title: Student Coach/Tutor
work.description: Mentor other students in newer cohorts than my own to assist them in completing projects.

work.title: CNC Machinist
work.description: Mill and lathe setup, maintain setup, and operation. Mentor other workers new to the area.

projects.title: Ghost Post App

testimonials.text: Helping others is an EXTREMELY important and impactful skill that all companies would want. Plus you are topping your class with your hard work and determination. Keep that up and opportunities are in the abundant for you.
Tala and I both sent Chris messages about how great you are with how you explain things and how you help us really understand concepts. We just wanted to make sure they knew how much you contribute.
testimonials.user: Kam Williamson - SE Student at Kenzie Academy
